text: Jewish Luck () is a 1925 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Alexis Granowsky.Создателем профессиональной еврейской литературы Шолом-Алейхем стал случайноЕВРЕЙСКОЕ СЧАСТЬЕ (1925) It stars Solomon Mikhoels, Moisei Goldblat, and Tamara Adelgeym. == Actors == * Solomon Mikhoels as Menahem-Mendl * Moisei Goldblat as Zalman * Tamara Adelgeym as Belya Kimbach * A. Epstein * I. Rogaler == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet silent movies Category:1925 movies
title: Jewish Luck
